message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone with your insights. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree the product is valuable, the price point is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $1,000,000.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I recognize your perspective on the price, the value this product offers is truly unique.  I could come down to $1,350,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its worth.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $1,200,000 is the highest I can go. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal.
